about_the_game:
Join your fellow train riders in the beautiful soundscape of When Our Journey Ends!

This is the digital version of the original soundtrack for When Our Journey Ends.
The following tracks are included:
1. When Our Journey Ends
2. Station Platform
3. All Aboard
4. Where am I?
5. Midway
6. Garden
7. Kitsune Encounter
8. Otherworldly Panic
9. Spider Woman
10. Welcoming Cottage
11. The Search
12. Reencounter
14. Trials
15. Her Radiance
16. Recollection
17. Departure
18. A Ballad to Convey the Feeling "Thank You"

Music composed by methyldragon, Wan Ming Yan, and F.

fullgame.name: When Our Journey Ends - A Visual Novel

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 61 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 61 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or above
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 9.0 supported card
  • Storage: 61 MB available space
